verse.name: c1
verse.lines: What a wonderful Savior, newline Is Jesus my Jesus! newline What a wonderful Savior, newline Is Jesus my Lord!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Christ has for sin atonement made; newline What a wonderful Savior! newline We are redeemed, the price is paid; newline What a wonderful Savior!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I praise Him for the cleansing blood; newline What a wonderful Savior! newline That reconciled my soul to God; newline What a wonderful Savior!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He cleansed my heart from all its sin; newline What a wonderful Savior! newline And now He reigns and rules therein; newline What a wonderful Savior!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: He gives me overcoming power; newline What a wonderful Savior! newline And triumph in each trying hour; newline What a wonderful Savior!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: To Him I've given all my heart; newline What a wonderful Savior! newline The world shall never share a part; newline What a wonderful Savior!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: He walks beside me in the way; newline What a wonderful Savior! newline And keeps me faithful day by day; newline What a wonderful Savior!
